item.title: Why MFF & Co Has Become One of the Fastest Growing Global Companies With a Team From the Global South
item.description: Over the last year and a half, few if any other major Latin American company has expanded as fast as Los Angeles-based MFF & Co. Just last year alone, Brazil’s Maria Farinha Filmes opened L.A. off
